Definition.WordDefinition: circumstances n 1: your overall circumstances or condition in life (including everything that happens to you); "whatever my fortune may be"; "deserved a better fate"; "has a happy lot"; "the luck of the Irish"; "a victim of circumstances"; "success that was her portion" [syn: {fortune}, {destiny}, {fate}, {luck}, {lot}, {portion}] 2: the state (usually personal) with regard to wealth; "each person was helped according to his circumstances" 3: a person's financial situation (good or bad); "he found himself in straitened circumstances"
